Inherited from Ottoman Turkish پازار (pazar), بازار (bazar, “bazaar, marketplace; Sunday”), from Classical Persian بازار (bāzār, “market”), from Middle Persian [script needed] (wʾčʾl /⁠wāzār⁠/).
